name: Bendy And the Abby's Secrets (Early Access)
name_original: Bendy And the Abby's Secrets (Early Access)
description:
Bendy And the Abby's Secrets - This is a fan game from the developer Hainyxgame Studios, the main character named Abby, she hid her secrets a few years ago, and after she remembers her secrets, which she hid a long time ago, she returns to the old studio, which ... was ... empty ... Your task: to find these secrets so that they would not find you ... This game is not connected with the original and the developers!

Former name of the game: (Bendy And the Henry's Secrets)

Log: Used game engine: Unity versions 2020.1.6f1. Very beautiful graphics (used Post Processing v2 )new props, new sounds, Sounds walking on different surfaces.

There are graphics settings, there is a player dialogue, the game is optimized (only for powerful PCs) the map is completely redone

Bug: Dialog system.

This is early access, and includes one chapter (1.1), soon I will post DLC (1.2), the game is raw, don't blame me) the game has been in development for about 7 months. Enjoy

System Requirements: Windows 7-10 (x64 bit only) Ram: 1 Gb CPU: 4 core Video: 2 GB recommended (DX11 Support) Memory in HDD-SSD: 300 MB.
